properties.property: Use Nuxeo Studio to change the list of columns displayed

labels.label: Use Nuxeo Studio to change the list of columns displayed (Listings & Views > Content Views > DefaultContentListingInNavigation)

properties.property: This layout can be configured on the "Create Layout" tab of this document type in Studio
This layout can be configured on the "View Layout" tab of this document type in Studio

whereClause.fixedPart: ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' and ecm:parentId= ?
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Other'
ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable'

ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable' AND payable:approve_status = 'Pending' AND payable:approver = ?

ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable' AND (payable:approve_status = 'Hold' OR payable:approve_status = 'NoPay') AND payable:approver = ?

whereClause.fixedPart: ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable' AND (payable:approve_status = 'Hold' OR payable:approve_status = 'NoPay')

contentView.title: Payable Pending Hold No Pay All

layout.title: Payable Pending Hold No Pay All

whereClause.fixedPart: ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable' AND payable:approve_status = 'Pending'

ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable' AND payable:paid = false AND payable:approve_status = 'Approved'

ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:primaryType = 'Payable' AND payable:paid = true AND payable:approve_status = 'Approved' AND payable:filed = false
ecm:parentId = ? AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND dc:title != 'Items'

state.name: deleted
state.description: Content is in the trash (before real deletion)

templateItem.title: Workspaces
templateItem.description: Use Nuxeo Studio to adapt the domain automated structure (Content Model > Structure Template > DomainFactory)

templateItem.title: Sections
templateItem.description: You can modify this automatically built structure from Studio: Content Model > Structure Template > DomainFactory

configuration.title: Header
configuration.description: The header widget just displays the widget label.

description.p: The Files displays an editable list of files, using javascript to keep the uploaded file path when adding several files in a row.
Items are defined using sub wigdets configuration.
This is actually a template widget type whose template uses a <nxu:inputList /> tag in edit or create mode, and a table iterating over items in other modes.

coreQueryPageProvider.name: tree_children
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Document WHERE ecm:parentId = ? AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:mixinType = 'Folderish' AND ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:isCheckedInVersion = 0 AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND dc:title != 'Items'

coreQueryPageProvider.name: user_workspaces
coreQueryPageProvider.pattern: SELECT * FROM Workspace WHERE ecm:mixinType != 'HiddenInNavigation' AND ecm:currentLifeCycleState != 'deleted' AND ecm:isProxy = 0 AND ecm:path STARTSWITH ? AND dc:title != 'Items'
